column1: Individual gas data from FAIR 1.3 model data files.

(3) Pre-industrial GHG concentrations in their default units for year 1765, (Source: http://www.pik-potsdam.de/~mmalte/rcps). Note: Initial values for CH3BR and CH3CL differed between data file and default values hard-coded into model.  The results here use the hard-coded default values.
(4) Radiative efficiences in W/m2/ppb from AR5 WG1 Ch8 SM.

(5) Fractional stratospheric release for ozone depleting substances (Daniel, J. and Velders, G.: A focus on information and options for policymakers, in: Scientific Assessment of Ozone Depletion, WMO, 2011)
(6) Number of bromine atoms in each species.
(7) Number of chlorine atoms in each species.
